concept.title: 233.215-70 ADDITIONAL CONTRACT CLAUSE.

conbody.p: Use the clause at 252.233-7001, Choice of Law (Overseas), in solicitations and contracts when contract performance will be outside the United States and its outlying areas, unless otherwise provided for in a government-to-government agreement.
